data.title: Dave's World
data.text:
Hal McClamma

Absentee General Manager

Hal has been a part of the Dave’s World family since 2007. Hal has been in retail for 37 years having held positions in sales, store management, distribution center management, district and regional management, director of store operations and company Vice President for two large home furnishings chains. Hal has also owned a full line furniture store, mattress store and appliance repair company. Additionally, Hal has consulted companies in 43 states and overseas in the areas of financial management, organizational development, merchandising, operations and sales and sales coaching. Hal and his wife of 32 years reside in Alabama.

Shane Clukey

HVAC Regional Manager - South

It is a passion of mine to help people. I look forward to giving every customer and employee an awesome experience. I have been in the service industry for 25 years and I look forward to striving in the heat pump world. Outside of work I have 2 kids that keep me busy with sports and other activities. My wife and I like to cruise in the Jeep on hot summer days and when we are not doing that, we also spend a lot of time by the poolside in the summer.

William Blanchard

HVAC Regional Manager - North

I was born and raised in Springfield, MA. I currently reside in Dexter, ME. I spent all of my summers in Maine growing up camping and enjoying the beach. I joined the United States Marine Corps while in High School and promptly left for bootcamp upon graduating High School. I spent the next 6 years as a helicopter mechanic for the Marine Corps. After completing my military service, I continued fixing helicopters and jets for the Marine Corps, Army, Navy, and the Air Force both stateside and overseas. Since 2017, I have moved away from mechanics and have enjoyed time in both the building materials and the HVAC distribution side. While I was working fulltime I attended and graduated college with Honors achieving my Bachelors degree in Business Management. In my spare time I enjoy hiking, flowers, cattle, restoring classic vehicles, and spending time with my wife and children. I am joining the Dover-Foxcroft location after a few years in the HVAC distribution field and look forward to working and growing with the team at Dave’s World.

Kristen Oliver

Marketing Consultant

Kristen joined Dave’s World in 2021 with over ten years of marketing and branding experience. Kristen was already familiar with the company, having been their account manager at a partner marketing agency for four years. A proud born and raised Mainer, Kristen moved to Florida to be closer to family in 2019, but has returned back to Maine where she currently resides with her husband Matt, daughter Ava, and beloved dog Sydney.

Mark Roy

Administrative and Technical Support

Mark began his HVAC career in 2008 working for a wholesale distributor in MA. Over the next 6 years Mark moved up several positions before finally ending up as a company wide sales and technical rep for Mitsubishi and Samsung residential and commercial Air Conditioning Systems. It was through this combination of sales and service expertise that Mark connected with Matt Scott, one of the owners of Dave’s World, and Mark’s largest residential client. Originally hired in 2014 as an in-home sales specialist Mark quickly transitioned over to Service Manager for the HVAC department at Dave’s World. As Dave’s World rapidly expanded the need for regional management arose. Mark accepted a position as Dave’s World’s Southern Maine Regional Manager, overseeing all office, install and service crews in Southern Maine. As of 2022 Mark is transitioning into his new role as Administrative and Technical Support for the entire company. Mark is an expert in mini split diagnostics and applications and specializes in residential mini split controls. Mark takes pride in staying ahead of the curve in this fast-moving industry and is a constant student of the business. If you need help with a heat pump, Mark is always happy to answer the call!

Jeffrey Myers

Sales Manager

I have been in the customer service industry for 30 years and am very excited to be joining Dave’s World. My goal is to make every customer experience an awesome one.

William Blanchard

HVAC Regional Manager - North

I was born and raised in Springfield, MA. I currently reside in Dexter, ME. I spent all of my summers in Maine growing up camping and enjoying the beach. I joined the United States Marine Corps while in High School and promptly left for bootcamp upon graduating High School. I spent the next 6 years as a helicopter mechanic for the Marine Corps. After completing my military service, I continued fixing helicopters and jets for the Marine Corps, Army, Navy, and the Air Force both stateside and overseas. Since 2017, I have moved away from mechanics and have enjoyed time in both the building materials and the HVAC distribution side. While I was working fulltime I attended and graduated college with Honors achieving my Bachelors degree in Business Management. In my spare time I enjoy hiking, flowers, cattle, restoring classic vehicles, and spending time with my wife and children. I am joining the Dover-Foxcroft location after a few years in the HVAC distribution field and look forward to working and growing with the team at Dave’s World.

Tyler Oversmith

HVAC Location Manager

Tyler is joining the Dave’s World team with over 10 years of management experience in high volume retail stores. He graduated with an undergraduate degree in Business and Logistics from Maine Maritime Academy and a Masters of Business Administration from the University of Phoenix.

Sabrina Keenan

Office Support Staff

Hi! My name is Sabrina Keenan, I was born and raised in Richmond Maine and moved to Dover-Foxcroft in 2019.

I work on my boyfriend’s family farm most nights and weekends. I like to hunt, fish, and spend time with family and friends. I am very excited to be joining the Dave’s World team!

Julianna Maddocks

Office Support Staff

Juli, a longtime local and graduate of Foxcroft Academy, is thrilled to be a part of our team. With years of professional customer service experience, she thrives in coming up with creative solutions and has a genuine desire to help others. She enjoys spending time with family and friends, and loves the outdoors. From recently discovering paddleboarding to her long time love of gardening, you can always find a sunny glow on her face.

Matt Mountain

Heat Pump Consultant

Matt is joining the Dave’s World team with over 10 years of sales experience. Matt is very personable and caring when it comes to his customers. He strives to make sure they are satisfied with every aspect of the process until the job is finished. Matt is excited for this opportunity and looks forward to working with everyone.

Matt resides in Dexter, Maine where he has spent his entire life. He enjoys hunting, fishing, golfing and spending time with his family.

Arne Halvorsen

Heat Pump Consultant

Arne came to us from an information technology and building supplies background. He brings over 20 years of sales experience to the team. Arne likes to fish and hunt, spend time with friends and family, and is an avid cribbage player. He and his wife live in Guilford and have three children.

K2 Spinney

Heat Pump Installer

K2 Spinney has been with Dave’s World since 2004. He started in appliance repair and was the first heat pump installer at Dave’s World. K2 holds several certifications and is well known in the HVAC community. In his free time K2 enjoys auto repair, home improvement, camping, fishing, and spending time with his family.

Nathan Langley

Heat Pump Installer

My name is Nathan Langley; my friends and coworkers call Me Nate. I am an avid motorcycle enthusiast and a dad. Those two things are what I do in my free time. I live in Canaan, Maine. I have worked in the trades since my first job. I have been installing heat pumps for the last six years, three of them being with Dave’s World. You know what they say about hindsight being 20/20? I wish I didn’t waste 3 years installing heat pumps for anyone else. Dave’s World is hands down the best company I have ever worked for and I’m proud to be a member of the Dave’s World family. The reputation they have for outstanding customer service and the core values is what led me to apply. The challenges of no job being the same and the satisfaction of a job well done is what will keep me here for many years to come.

Zach Andrews

Heat Pump Installer

Zach joined the Dave’s World team in July of 2020. He enjoys sports and working hard, and is excited to be a part of our team! He is following in his father’s footsteps who has been working for Dave’s World out of our Scarborough branch for several years.

Angie Knapp

Heat Pump Electrician

My name is Angie Weeks Knapp. I am a State of Maine Master Electrician and have been in the trade since 2002. I have worked in the residential, small commercial and solar fields. It is a blast working with my hands to create a product. I also enjoy being a part of a team to create great experiences for customers. I have four children and we love the outdoors. In our free time we are playing sports, out on trails, or on the water.

Dell Hoskins

Heat Pump Electrician

Dell came to Dave’s World in the summer of 2019 with a passion for quality electrical work. From grocery store and retail electrical service, utility pole and parking lot lighting upgrades to standby generators and grounding systems, he is always up for the challenge. Experienced in residential and commercial installations, he brings a skill set that enables him to flex to our business needs, and he always goes the extra distance to leave our clients feeling confident in their investment.

Michael Mountain

Heat Pump Electrician

Hello. I am Michael Mountain, Heat Pump/Electrical Installer. In the picture is my wonderful girlfriend Sabine and my dog Flash. I grew up in Dexter and have lived primarily in Central Maine, now residing in Pittsfield. My family and extended family are very important to me and my life. Other interests I have are golfing, four-wheeling, boating, hunting, fishing, hiking, biking, and traveling to warmer climates.

James MacGlashing

Heat Pump Installer

Hello. My name is Jim MacGlashing. I recently moved to Dexter, Maine from Massachusetts but have been visiting Maine for my entire life. I have 11 years of experience in HVAC work including heat pumps, air handlers, ducted systems, furnaces and boilers. I live with my fiancée Mary Jane and I am excited to be joining Team Awesome! I also enjoy hunting, fishing and anything outdoors.

Charles Eddy

HVAC Preventative Maintenance Technician

My name is Charlie. I’ve lived in the Dover area most of my life. I like to spend most of my free time with my family or trying to keep my house and vehicles in good running order. I spend as much time outside as I possibly can going fishing, hunting, or spending time at camp. I like to be busy.

Sam Franke

Plumbing and Propane Installer

Sam loves hunting, fishing and everything outdoors! He loves working on anything mechanical and is proud to serve his local community as a service technician for Dave’s World!

Skyler Gilbert

HVAC Service Technician

Hi my name is Skyler Gilbert, I live in Charleston and I’m married with 3 boys. I was born and raised in Parkman Maine. I entered the HVAC world by taking the HVAC-R program at EMCC back in 2013 and after a long hiatus I started installing heat pumps in 2020. I then moved over to the service side and have been doing that ever since. I’m looking forward to growing my skill set with Dave’s world. In my spare time you can find me probably fly fishing or ice fishing in the winter, hunting, camping, video games, snowmobiling or watching football or anything outdoors! Also I am the biggest Kansas city Chiefs fan you will ever meet.

Donald Poole

Heat Pump Installer

My name is Donnie Poole. I have lived and grown up in Maine my entire life. I have 2 years of electrical schooling under my belt and I am excited to join this team and learn more. In my free time I enjoy sports, fishing, dirt biking, and snowmobiling.

Shane Clukey

HVAC Regional Manager - South

It is a passion of mine to help people. I look forward to giving every customer and employee an awesome experience. I have been in the service industry for 25 years and I look forward to striving in the heat pump world. Outside of work I have 2 kids that keep me busy with sports and other activities. My wife and I like to cruise in the Jeep on hot summer days and when we are not doing that, we also spend a lot of time by the poolside in the summer.

Megan Moreau

HVAC Location Manager

Megan was born and raised in Westbrook, Maine. She graduated from Bay Path University in 2018 with a Bachelor’s in health and human studies. Megan recently joined Dave’s World and is looking forward to providing awesome customer service to help the company grow to its fullest potential! She enjoys spending her spare time being active with her dogs, training for triathlons, and spending time with her family.

Julie Tarsetti

Office Support Staff

My name is Julie Tarsetti. I re-joined Dave’s World in December as an Office Support team member in the Windham location. I have spent most of my career in customer service, starting out as a hair stylist for ten years and then getting my Associate’s degree in medical assisting. I enjoy all the aspects of helping people. For the past sixteen years I have managed my family’s grocery store which was fun and a great learning experience. I am now excited to share my customer service experience with Dave’s World and be a part of this awesome team. When I am not working I love spending time with my husband and two dogs Geppetto and Rocky.

Christopher Linscott

Office Support Staff

My name’s Chris. I grew up in South Portland but I’ve been in Windham since 2014. I have experience in commercial painting, sales, and medical supplies. In my spare time you’ll find me with my wife and 3 kids playing soccer or building Legos. I look forward to helping you all!

Kendall Willard

Heat Pump Consultant

Kendall works in our Sales Department and brings years of experience in the Heating and Cooling industry. He has been selling and installing heat pumps for 10 years and enjoys helping people design and implement the most efficient method to heat or cool a space. He strives to give each customer the time and attention to detail that they require to ensure a perfect fit for their individual home or business.

Kendall lives in the Sugarloaf area and spends his free time snowboarding, hiking and enjoying all that Maine has to offer.

Nick Moore

Heat Pump Consultant

I joined Team Awesome in 2020 because of Dave’s World’s unparalleled persistence in making customers happy! I have been married to my college sweetheart for almost 10 years, and we have 2 incredible boys Liam and Lucas. I have worked in several different fields including: construction, restaurant management, Corporate America, manufacturing, and sales. I have also owned my own business doing dock installs and removals in the Sebago Lakes Region for 13 years. Dave’s World’s core values and mission are the reason I will be part of this work family for a long time!

Todd Flaherty

Heat Pump Consultant

Born and raised in the Bath, ME area. I attended Morse High School, U-Maine -Mechanical Engineering. I worked at Cianbro out of college then 14 Years of HVAC sales experience working for various manufacturer’s representatives followed by 16 more years of being a partner in Aircon, an HVAC manufacturer’s representative. I have coached basketball at the high school level for 25 + years, most recently for the past 6 years the girls varsity basketball coach at Greely High School. I enjoy boating/fishing and golf and am an all-around sports enthusiast. Married to Kate Callan Flaherty for 25 years, we reside on the New Meadows River in Phippsburg, ME with our 2 dogs and a cat.

Steve Newcomb

Heat Pump Installer

I’m Steve, I started here at Dave’s World as soon as we opened the Windham location! Graduated from M-tech with my universal refrigerant certifications. I really enjoy the outdoors, whether it be riding my snowmobile, dirt biking, snowboarding, or skateboarding. If it’s got a motor I love it! My family and friends mean the world to me, and I look forward to you joining ours! Bonus points if you’ve got pets! See y’all soon!

Doug Walker

Heat Pump Installer

My name is Doug and I’m 31 years old. I’m an avid fisherman and love the outdoors. I love spending time with my family and my goofy 7- (almost 8) year-old daughter. I’ve had hands-on jobs my whole working life. I got into doing HVAC and I really enjoy it, and I’m excited to pursue it as a career.

Justin Smith

Heat Pump Installer

My name’s Justin and I’ve been doing HVAC for 4 years now. In my free time I enjoy doing anything active such as playing softball, working out, or enjoying time on Sebago Lake! Family and friends mean the world to me, and I look forward to meeting you!

Michael Mowatt

Heat Pump Installer

Hi my name is Mike. I am a new HVAC technician but already love working for this amazing company, I enjoy spending time with my family and most outdoor activities.

Eric LaLiberty

Heat Pump Installer

Eric LaLiberty started at Dave’s World in April of 2021 and is excited to be part of the Heat pump installation team. He graduated from NTI 4 years ago with his refrigeration certifications. Eric has been married to his wife Kristen for 21 years and has 2 sons. He enjoys coaching, fishing, skiing, ATV’s, and camping with his family.

Hunter Connors

Heat Pump Installer

I’m Hunter and I am 19 years old. I graduated in 2022 from Gorham. I like to disc golf in my free time and spend time with my kids and fiance.

Forrest Diffin

Heat Pump Installer

Hey! My names Forrest and some call me “Bud” feel free to use either. I’m new to the HVAC scene. I keep busy outside of work with a ton of hobbies or anything competitive. Some including, woodworking, snowboarding, golf/disc golf, DJing and many more. Looking forward to meeting you all and learning/growing with the company.

James Cline

Heat Pump Installer

This is James I went to school for hvac in Iowa. I like to fish, camp and hike. I also like to go to concerts in my free time.

Austin Laliberty

Heat Pump Installer

Hi, I’m Austin. I enjoy fishing and camping in my free time. I come from a welding background and am looking forward to learning and growing as a heat pump installer.

Chuck Martz

Heat Pump Electrician

Chuck has been a Master Electrician for over 20 years working from Maine to across the country and across the world. He has done work ranging from residential to industrial, but in any job loves to present solutions and solve problems. Dave’s World gives him opportunity to do what he loves, while providing a great product and doing good work.

Jim Colman

Heat Pump Electrician

Electrician since 1992, serving the New England area for over 20 years.

Cory Fredericks

Heat Pump Electrician

Hi, my name is Cory Fredericks. I have been in the electrical field since I was in middle school. I currently live in Hollis, my son Jackson is a junior at Brunswick High School & is a great student and son! I enjoy Paddle Boarding, Surfing, Skiing, and hanging out at the lake with friends and family in my spare time. I am excited to be a part of Maine’s leading Heat Pump company, so thank you all! Look forward to meeting you all soon, have an awesome day!

Tim Jilek

Heat Pump Electrician

Hello happy people! I’m proud to share my life’s experiences with you and the awesome people of Dave’s World. Originally born and raised in the Midwest, I left for the service and traveled all of these United States and abroad, learning the trade and gathering stories. I liked the Maine life so much that I’ve made it my home for about 15 years. So say Hi when you get the chance and share a story.

Nolan Rioux

Heat Pump Electrician

Hi, my name is Nolan. I started my electrical career 8+ years ago where I’ve grown and earned my masters. I live in Monmouth with my wife and two boys. I enjoy spending time outdoors. I’m very excited to be part of the Dave’s World team!

Brad Cornish

HVAC Service Technician

My name’s Brad and I’ve been in HVAC for over 2 years now but have been in the trades for about 8, coming from a background of swimming pool construction and service. In my free time you’ll find me on Sebago or in the garage tinkering with something motorized. I look forward to meeting and hopefully helping you all!

Jackson Kessler

HVAC Service Technician

I am Jackson. I have been in the field since 2019. I enjoy spending time with my family and visiting upstate New York where I grew up. I look forward to meeting you and helping you with your heat pump needs.

Shane Clukey

HVAC Regional Manager - South

It is a passion of mine to help people. I look forward to giving every customer and employee an awesome experience. I have been in the service industry for 25 years and I look forward to striving in the heat pump world. Outside of work I have 2 kids that keep me busy with sports and other activities. My wife and I like to cruise in the Jeep on hot summer days and when we are not doing that, we also spend a lot of time by the poolside in the summer.

Daniel Cross

HVAC Location Manager

Dan is a balance of hands on and behind the scenes expertise. After nearly a decade of running his own business of selling, installing and servicing heat pumps, he decided to join Dave’s World for the opportunity of furthered growth, knowledge and teamwork. With college degrees in Culinary Arts and Risk Management, Dan’s interests are as diverse as his background and skill set, and he prides himself on being a lifelong learner. Dan owns a home in Buxton with his family, and is always looking forward to the snow melting to allow him to enjoy outdoor activities and home projects with his son and two dogs.

Adrian Bouchard

Heat Pump Consultant

Adrian works as an outside sales representative, meeting with our customers in their homes to find the right heat pump and the right solution to their heating and air conditioning needs. He holds a B.S. degree from the University of Maine. He brings 34 years of sales experience, an easy going style, and a passion for heat pumps that makes our customers confident they have made the right choice.

Adrian and his family live in Windham, where he enjoys motorcycle touring, occasionally swinging a golf club, and spending time with his special needs grandson.

Jason Willard

Heat Pump Consultant

Jason came to us with a background in information technologies and supply chain management. He is passionate about making clients’ investment toward a more efficient home a seamless and awesome experience. He has a Bachelor’s in Business Management from University of Maine and grew up in Portland. He is very excited to make every day an awesome experience for all his clients. Outside of work he loves to snowboard at Sugarloaf, fish, hike, and enjoy all the outdoor activities Maine has to offer. At the end of the day, he is a family man and enjoys his evenings home with his wife and son in Portland.

Tim Andrews

Heat Pump Installer

I grew up in the Dover-Foxcroft area. Started working for Dave’s World in 2014. Moved to southern Maine in 2016 to support the Dave’s World team as it continues to grow.

Aaron Sinclair

Heat Pump Installer

Heat pump installer, EPA type 1, type 2 Certified. Born and raised in Maine.

Cody Ruck

Heat Pump Installer

Hi my name is Cody and I’ve been doing HVAC for 5 years now. In my free time I enjoy hanging with friends and family and also spending my time outside fishing, four-wheeling, or riding my motorcycle. I look forward to meeting you and making you another satisfied Dave’s World customer!

Carmen Picardi

Heat Pump Installer

Carmen is from Boston, MA and recently moved to Maine to experience “the way life should be”.

He’s been in the HVAC field for over 25 years, concentrating on installations and service. In his free time he loves to travel and learn about different cultures. He’s a huge motorcycle

enthusiast and has been thinking about getting a sidecar so he can bring along his dog Koji.

Shaun Baggit

Heat Pump Installer

Growing up in Mass, Shaun worked as a carpenter before making the move to Maine 10 years ago. He joined the Dave’s World team in 2022. In his spare time, he enjoys hunting, fishing, and is a licensed Maine saltwater fishing guide.

Patrick Pearson

Heat Pump Installer

My name’s Patrick; I grew up locally in Southern Maine and have lived here my entire life. I joined the Marine Corps right out of high school but spend most of my days now either playing with my dogs or outdoors somewhere. I love boating in the summers and the woodstove at camp in the winter. I’ve been in the trade for a couple years and look forward to growing my skill set within this company, as well as serving the great Maine community.

Seth Jones

Heat Pump Installer

Hello, my name is Seth Jones. I have lived in Maine my entire life. My hobbies are running, painting, and playing with my dog. I am new to HVAC and eager to learn!

Damion Taylor

Heat Pump Installer

I am new to the HVAC/ heat pump installation world. I’ve spent the last 10 years in public safety/fire fighting & EMS. I am an outdoors man who enjoys spending time in the Maine woods fishing or hiking with my yellow lab.

Isiah Brown

Heat Pump Installer

Hello, I am Isiah Brown. New to HVAC but have been in the construction/laboring field for approximately 8 years. My number one priority is my family. Also love the outdoors.

Gage Machado

Heat Pump Electrician

Graduated from KVCC 2021 in the electrical technology program, Electrician, from Greene, ME.

I enjoy hiking and being outside. Excited to join the installing team and Dave’s world team.

Ethan Garnett

Heat Pump Electrician

Hey there, my name is Ethan Garnett. I got my start in the electrical field during highschool and I have worked on a variety of commercial and residential projects. In my free time I love to be in the outdoors with my family whether it be hiking or going up to camp. I also enjoy many different activities like skiing, rock climbing, and volleyball. I’m looking forward to growing with the company and building lasting relationships.

Aaron Beaulieu

HVAC Service Technician

Hi, my name is Aaron Beaulieu. I have been a HVAC tech for 6 years. I enjoy spending time with my one year old daughter and my beautiful wife. Love being outside fishing, riding bikes and going to the beach. I’m very excited to service our awesome customers for years to come.

Thomas Dow

HVAC Service Technician

SMCC graduate in the HVAC program, started in commercial HVAC but have found heat pumps to be my favorite. I enjoy restoring cars in my spare time, hiking around Maine, and photography. Always enjoy and look forward to the opportunity to meet new people and learn new things.

Michael St. Hilaire

HVAC Preventative Maintenance Technician

I’ve been in Maine over 20 years and live in Berwick with my wife and three children. I enjoy my motorcycle and playing disc golf, my RC cars, and of course spending time with my family.

William Blanchard

HVAC Regional Manager - North

I was born and raised in Springfield, MA. I currently reside in Dexter, ME. I spent all of my summers in Maine growing up camping and enjoying the beach. I joined the United States Marine Corps while in High School and promptly left for bootcamp upon graduating High School. I spent the next 6 years as a helicopter mechanic for the Marine Corps. After completing my military service, I continued fixing helicopters and jets for the Marine Corps, Army, Navy, and the Air Force both stateside and overseas. Since 2017, I have moved away from mechanics and have enjoyed time in both the building materials and the HVAC distribution side. While I was working fulltime I attended and graduated college with Honors achieving my Bachelors degree in Business Management. In my spare time I enjoy hiking, flowers, cattle, restoring classic vehicles, and spending time with my wife and children. I am joining the Dover-Foxcroft location after a few years in the HVAC distribution field and look forward to working and growing with the team at Dave’s World.

Caitlin Brimhall

HVAC Location Manager - Ellsworth

I’m very excited to have joined the Dave’s World family and look forward to growing with the company. I bring with me years of experience in customer service. In my free time I enjoy hiking, kayaking, roller skating and karaoke with my family.

Natalie Stilwell

Office Support Staff

I’m Natalie and I am excited to have started 2023 by going the Dave’s World team! I enjoy office work more than someone should and am happy to start this new chapter in my life. My husband and I reside in Ellsworth with our 2 Maine Coon cats and more than a few Harley’s. We enjoy riding when we can, fishing, and traveling to new places. I also enjoy baking and sharing it with my new Dave’s World family.

Mikayla McFetridge

Office Support Staff

Hello! My name is Mikayla and I was raised in Boothbay Harbor Maine and spent most of my summers with my grandmother on Isle Au Haut. I now live in Mariaville with my partner and 2 cats and a yellow lab named Brody. I love hiking and anything outdoors as well as curling up with a good book or fun video game. If you hear laughter I am probably involved as I love to make others laugh and smile. I have been working in healthcare for 11 years and decided it was time for a change, when I met the Ellsworth crew I knew I would fit right in and am so glad they decided the same!

Shane McCannell

Heat Pump Consultant

Shane is an outside sales representative for Dave’s World covering the northern half of Maine. He brings more then 20 years of sales experience to the awesome Dave’s World team. Shane prides himself on finding the right solution for both your heating and cooling needs as well as your budget. This leads customers to know they have made the right choice with both Shane and Dave’s World.

Shane, his wife, and their four boys live in Bradley; he spends most of his free time with his kids at their many activities as well as coaching some of their sports teams.

Glen Veevaert

Heat Pump Consultant

Hi! My name is Glen and I’m excited to be part of Team Awesome at Dave’s World. Throughout my sales career it’s been my passion to be customer focused and always working to deliver the best sales and customer service experience possible. I enjoy life and appreciate the opportunity to expand and grow while serving our customers and accomplishing our mission of providing an Awesome customer experience. In my personal life, I’ve been married to my wife, Jane, for 36 years. We met flying helicopters for the Army and we have 3 grown children ranging from 18 to 29 years of age. In our free time, we enjoy being outdoors, exercising, working in the garden, or doing house projects.

John Sharrow

Heat Pump Consultant

I’m John, a sales consultant for Team Ellsworth. Back in the early days of Dave’s World I delivered appliances for Dave with Dan and Bob and repaired appliances at the same time Matt was doing service work. I’ve worked in the industrial field previously, travelling around the US and am happy to now be traveling around the great state of Maine working with the Awesome Team here at Dave’s World. I reside in Glenburn with my wife of 24 years and my 3 daughters. I love getting outside and spending time with my family.

Brian McDonald

Heat Pump Installer

Me and my wife with 3 dogs reside in Lamoine where I’ve been a house and yacht builder for 30+ years. I’m also a licensed taxidermist who loves to hunt, fish, and enjoy the outdoors when time permits it. I’m also a gearhead who has built street rods to 60’s high-performance Mopar muscle cars for a hobby. Needed a life change so now I’m a heat pump installer for Dave’s World in the Ellsworth area.

Matthew Lounsberry

Heat Pump Installer

My name is Matthew Lounsberry, and I started at Daves World in June of 2021. I have been an electrician’s helper since 2015, and I am currently studying to get my journeyman license. When I am not at work, I enjoy spending time with my family, playing music, reading, and coming up with new projects around the house.

Adam Dawes

Heat Pump Installer

My name is Adam Dawes, I grew up and still reside in Holden. I went to EMCC for HVAC and have been installing heat pumps for 10 years now. I had my own heat pump business for 3 years before starting with Dave’s World. I really enjoy complex and challenging installations and take great pride in making my work look good. When not working I love spending time with my daughters, wife and family.

Sam Thomas

Heat Pump Installer

When not on an install you can find Sam watching any of the 4 Boston sports teams… or you probably can’t find Sam because he is out fishing, hiking or exploring nature with his fiancé and 2 boys.

Brian Gilmore

Heat Pump Installer

Hello,

I’m Brian Gilmore. I’m originally from Belfast but have lived in Vermont for 30 years. I’ve been back in Maine since 2011, residing in Hartland. I have spent 35 years in automotive but my skill sets are many as I have an unquenchable thirst for knowledge and abilities. Prior to coming to Dave’s World I was a technician for commercial laundry systems throughout Maine. I’m a very hands on type of person. Though I’ve just begun my adventures in hvac, I’m very happy to be on board. I look forward to meeting and working with all of you.

Kevin Audibert

Heat Pump Electrician

I was born and have lived in Maine for my entire life. I graduated from KVCC in Fairfield Maine in 2001. I started out working for commercial electrical contractors until I obtained my master electrician’s license. From there I started and ran my own business for 18 years specializing in residential electrical construction,renovation, and service work, as well as some light commercial work. I have recently retired from running my business and am greatly enjoying working at Dave’s World!
